properties.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
properties.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued February 3 at 7:26AM PST until February 3 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph
expected. Waves 1 to 3 feet.

* WHERE...Pyramid Lake.

* WHEN...From 10 AM to 6 PM PST today.

* IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone
to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until
conditions improve.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest waves are expected on the south
shore.
properties.instruction:
Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a
sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing
boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

NWSheadline: LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING FOR PYRAMID LAKE
